summary: The module provides command‑line utilities to augment pretrained NeMo speech‑recognition models with lightweight adapter modules, train those adapters, evaluate their accuracy on test sets, and analyze experiment results to identify optimal hyper‑parameter settings based on word‑error‑rate metrics.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to efficiently adapt existing ASR models to new domains, assess the adapted models' performance, and derive data‑driven insights for improving speech‑recognition accuracy.
